thread.title: OPPO A57 with 16MP selfie camera launching in India on February 3rd
thread.title_full: OPPO A57 with 16MP selfie camera launching in India on February 3rd

title: OPPO A57 with 16MP selfie camera launching in India on February 3rd
text:
OPPO A57 with 16MP selfie camera launching in India on February 3rd OPPO A57 with 16MP selfie camera launching in India on February 3rd By January 27, 2017 “The A57 features a 5.2-inch display, 3GB of RAM and 32GB of storage” 
OPPO is all set to add a new selfie-centric smartphone to its portfolio in India. The company has announced that it will be launching the OPPO A57 smartphone in the country on February 3rd. The device was originally unveiled in China in November last year. The A57’s main highlight is a 16-megapixel front-facing camera for selfies and video calling. The all new #OPPOA57 is hitting the markets on the 3rd of February. Get ready to become unstoppable. #UnstoppableSelfies pic.twitter.com/LKc4bvNHlH — OPPO Mobile India (@oppomobileindia) January 27, 2017 
The OPPO A57 features a 13-megapixel primary snapper at the back with an LED flash. It comes with a 5.2-inch HD display with a layer of 2.5D glass on top. It utilises an octa-core Qualcomm Snapdragon 435 processor, mated to 3GB of RAM. The device comes with 32GB of expandable storage, Android Marshmallow with a skin of Color OS 3.0 on top, a 2,900mAh battery, a metal unibody design, a fingerprint sensor embedded into the home button and 4G LTE. 
The OPPO A57 is available in China at the equivalent of around Rs 16,000, and is being offered in gold and rose gold hues. We will have more details next week, so stay tuned. Facebook Comments
